name: The Chess Variants Club
description:
Play and discover 21 popular chess variants, improve your chess skills with hundreds of chess puzzles, or simply play regular chess with your friends - all in one package.

This diverse collection includes several chess games and puzzles that will entertain you and your friends for thousands of hours. All in a minimalist, beautifully designed virtual chess club.

Key Features:

  • Play against the computer or with your friends using Remote Play Together;
  • 21 Chess Variants to learn and play;
  • More than 500 chess puzzles to solve;
